code: import React,{useRef}from'react';import styles from'./Construction.module.css';import flashcard1 from'../../assets/flashcard1.jpg';import flashcard2 from'../../assets/flashcard2.jpg';import flashcard3 from'../../assets/flashcard3.jpg';import flashcard4 from'../../assets/flashcard4.jpg';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Construction=()=>{const flashcards=[{imgSrc:flashcard1,title:"Modular Kitchen",description:"Functional kitchen with modern design."},{imgSrc:flashcard2,title:"Full Home Interior",description:"Latest interior solutions for your home."},{imgSrc:flashcard3,title:"End to End Construction",description:"Latest home solutions."},{imgSrc:flashcard4,title:"Luxury Interiors",description:"Latest home solutions."}];const containerRef=useRef(null);const scroll=direction=>{if(containerRef.current){const{scrollLeft,clientWidth}=containerRef.current;const scrollTo=direction==='left'?scrollLeft-clientWidth:scrollLeft+clientWidth;containerRef.current.scrollTo({left:scrollTo,behavior:'smooth'});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.container,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"One-stop shop for all construction and interiors"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Be it end-to-end construction, interior or modular solutions, we have it all for your home or ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"office.
